name: StoryAction
summary: Represents action sheduled for something (for example NPC)

setLabel.summary: Changes action's label to provided one. Returns this storyaction

getLabel.summary: Returns label assigned to this action

blocking.summary: Makes script wait util this StoryAction was completed. Incompatible with then property

then.summary: Makes StoryAction execute provided invoker when StoryAction was completed. Incompatible with blocking property
